title: "Dieci" Fat Slab ID
content:
...Stumbled upon this Italian designer at [LeftLoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040822/http:/www.leftloft.com/projects/), and there’s a face that I can’t ID. Thanks in advance for your help, and enjoy the type:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040822im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dieci-cover__jpg_940x250_q85_5748.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040822im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dieci-testate_01_3578.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040822im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dieci-testate_02_3902.jpg)
author: microspective

comments.content:
Nope. Not Prelo.

Christian Robertson did a slab unicase once, which he used to offer for free.  
Can’t find it anywhere.

As far as I know it’s a custom display face they designed just for Dieci: [http://www.leftloft.it/projects/dieci/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040822/http:/www.leftloft.it/projects/dieci/ "http://www.leftloft.it/projects/dieci/")
Very interesting typeface. As stated by verbosus, should be a custom face but does anybody have similars to suggest?
Thanks Renko. PF Centro Slab is a quite good similar.

I recently contacted these guys and they graciously replied to let me know that it was a custom font for the project (unfinished and thus unreleased).

I’m encouraged by everyone’s research, though. Centro is such an awesome find. Thanks for that link.

Case closed(?)
